GapFillInput.Title: Holidays
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type a word or phrase from the word pool into each gap.

Content.Question:
Bill: Hi Candy, how was Italy?
Candy: Great, thanks.
Bill: Where did you stay?
Candy: Near Naples, in a very luxurious hotel.
Bill: Oh I know Naples. We stayed near there a few years ago.
Candy: Yeah?
Bill: Yes, Kelly was only a baby then so we stayed in self-catering accommodation near the beach.
Candy: The beach near our hotel was very crowded especially at the weekend, so I spent most of my time by the hotel swimming pool. It was much more peaceful and relaxing.
Bill: Did you travel around at all?
Candy: Yes, we went on an excursion to Pompei. It's a very interesting place but we had
to queue for a long time to get into the ruins.
Bill: How was the travelling?
Candy: Fine.
Bill: We had a terrible time when we went. Our flight was delayed by
four hours.
Candy: I can imagine that with a baby!
Bill: Yes, it was awful.
